1.1.name: wordpress/socialcountdown
1.1.description:
SocialCountdown Wordpress plugin provides an easy way to integrate an existing SocialCountdown timer into a Wordpress webpage.

To create a free SocialCountdown timer, navigate to https://socialcountdown.com

The plugin provides the short code: [sc_widget]

To include a SocialCountdown timer on a Wordpress post, simply include the following short code:

[sc_widget timerid="000-000-0000000"]

where "000-000-0000000" is the id of the countdown you are embedding. The short code will render a widget of the referenced countdown timer complete with the background image that was defined.

To create a small widget, specify a size attribute with the value "small" as follows:

[sc_widget timerid="000-000-0000000" size="small"]
